title: How to Log Out of Slack on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open Slack on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Slack on your iPhone or iPad. It’s the icon with multicolored squares and a black “S” inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen.

steps.title: Tap the ⁝ menu.
steps.content: Tap the ⁝ menu. It’s at the top-right corner of Slack.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It’s at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Sign Out of (your team name).
steps.content: Tap Sign Out of (your team name) . This will log you out of your Slack team.
